name: 王鴻祥
objective:
本課程之目的係協助學生進行設計意象相關主題之研究與實務專題分析，以培養各種意象理論與分析方法之能力。
The objective of this course is to help the students whose topics of graduate projects are related to design image to prepare their preliminary studies. This course provides the necessary theoretical tools and case analysis, and its contents contain image of material, image of shape, image of content, to establish the ability about theory of image and analysis method.
schedule:
WEEK
01 Bridge-in & Intro.
02 Pre-assessment & Project Intro.
03-05 Project 1: Form/ Appearance- Absrtaction/ Pattern Recognition/Transform
06 Presentation
07-08 Project 2: Function/ Usability- Product Category 
09 Presentation
10-12 Project 3: Sense/ Meaning- Product Semantics/ Product Image
13 Presentation
14-16 Machine Learning- Developing New Approaches to Image Analysis
18 Presentation
scorePolicy:
40% for Class participation &  Pre- and Post-tests
20% for Project performance
20% for Oral presentation
20% for Final report & data
+10% Bonus for awards-winning and publishing.
